column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////A short easy 5 minute wait
column4: friendly service from everyone (whether we were their table or not) and great tasting
column7: outstanding food!! Not sure how I could be impressed with a house salad
column8: but I was. It was big
column10: tomatoes were diced and bright red and juicy and the ranch here is fantastic!  The pizza??? Stellar!!!! Had a "Lou" with spinach
column13: delicious!!!! I want to try other places
column14: but I know this place has set the bar **high** and I'm positive no matter which others I try
